intent: pass a string into subprocess.Popen
rewritten_intent:
set the stdin of the process 'grep f' to be 'one
two
three
four
five
six
'
snippet:
p = subprocess.Popen(['grep', 'f'], stdout=subprocess.PIPE, stdin=subprocess.PIPE)
p.stdin.write('one
two
three
four
five
six
')
p.communicate()[0]
p.stdin.close()

intent: get line count
rewritten_intent: get line count of file `filename`
snippet:
def bufcount(filename):
    f = open(filename)
    lines = 0
    buf_size = (1024 * 1024)
    read_f = f.read
    buf = read_f(buf_size)
    while buf:
        lines += buf.count('\n')
        buf = read_f(buf_size)
    return lines
